analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: The GMS score of 41 signals a transition into a Neutral regime. Stability in VIX (Volatility) and DXY (Dollar strength) has anchored the market index. While the legislative override on tariffs provides a significant macro tailwind, the depressed crypto sentiment remains a key headwind. Momentum pushed the score to 41, suggesting a cautious wait-and-see approach. Focus on global liquidity variances and risk stabilization before increasing exposure.

reports.EN: The GMS score of 41 signals a transition into a Neutral regime. Stability in VIX (Volatility) and DXY (Dollar strength) has anchored the market index. While the legislative override on tariffs provides a significant macro tailwind, the depressed crypto sentiment remains a key headwind. Momentum pushed the score to 41, suggesting a cautious wait-and-see approach. Focus on global liquidity variances and risk stabilization before increasing exposure.
reports.ES: El puntaje GMS de 41 indica un rÃ©gimen Neutral. La estabilidad observada en el VIX (volatilidad) y el DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar) mantiene al mercado equilibrado. Aunque el alivio en los aranceles representa un viento de cola macroeconÃ³mico positivo, el deprimido sentimiento en las criptomonedas actÃºa como un freno importante. El impulso empujÃ³ el puntaje a 41, sugiriendo una postura de espera. Es crucial monitorear la liquidez neta antes de tomar nuevas posiciones de riesgo.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 41 menandakan transisi ke rezim Netral. Stabilitas pada VIX (indeks ketakutan) dan DXY (kekuatan dolar) memberikan landasan yang stabil bagi pasar saat ini. Meskipun pembatalan tarif memberikan dorongan makro yang positif, sentimen kripto yang rendah tetap menjadi hambatan utama bagi pemulihan aset berisiko. Momentum mendorong skor ke tingkat 41, menyarankan pendekatan yang lebih selektif dan waspada terhadap fluktuasi likuiditas global serta arah kebijakan fiskal.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score von 41 signalisiert den Ãœbergang in ein neutrales Marktumfeld. Die StabilitÃ¤t des VIX (VolatilitÃ¤t) und des DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke) verankert das aktuelle Niveau. WÃ¤hrend die Aufhebung der ZÃ¶lle einen makroÃ¶konomischen Aufwind bietet, wirkt das gedrÃ¼ckte Krypto-Sentiment als erheblicher Gegenwind. Der Momentum-Vektor hat den Score auf 41 geschoben, was auf eine abwartende Haltung hindeutet. Anleger sollten die LiquiditÃ¤tsentwicklung genau beobachten, bevor sie weitere Risiken eingehen.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 41 signale une transition vers un rÃ©gime Neutre. La stabilitÃ© du VIX (volatilitÃ©) et du DXY (force du dollar) maintient l'Ã©quilibre actuel du marchÃ©. Si l'annulation des tarifs douaniers offre un soutien macroÃ©conomique, la faiblesse persistante du sentiment crypto freine toute accÃ©lÃ©ration majeure. L'Ã©lan a poussÃ© le score Ã  41, suggÃ©rant une attitude de prudence et d'observation. Surveillez attentivement les variations de la liquiditÃ© nette pour identifier le prochain mouvement.
